name: Be The ONE
description:
Be The ONE is a fast paced shooter where you have to defeat endless waves of enemies.
After a raid your friends and allies got killed and you are the last one to be alive.
Find your best strategy to defeat as many enemies as possible to stay alive.

  • 4 weapons: Find the weapon you like the most

  • 4 enemy types: Defeat all 4 enemy types to stay alive

  • Shop: Go to the shop, level up and find the best strategy to win
